intro: Fumaria officinalis var. elegans, commonly known as the elegant common celandine, is a flowering plant belonging to the Papaveraceae family. It is characterized by its erect, branched stems and bright yellow flowers that bloom in early summer. The plant produces capsule fruits containing numerous small, elliptical seeds. It thrives in disturbed soils and is often found in meadows, roadsides, and waste areas. Its medicinal properties have been historically valued for their potential healing benefits.
